name: Hang In There
description: Back in 2014 a buddy of mine did a series of paintings of fictional 1980s arcade machines. The paintings were really cool. I decided to bring a few of the paintings to life by jamming out little games based on his concepts (which were little more than a name and a pic of an arcade cabinet). The first one I did was Hang In There, a game that was inspired by that cat poster that any '80s kid has etched into their memory. I built Hang In There in 48 hours at the end of February, 2014. It's about all of the stuff that distracted me from school when I was little. Avoid all that stuff, study hard, and hang in there!
